attributes.action: Government to regulate and monitor how baby milk is distributed during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To stop exploitation of vital essentials to parents and babies. To keep babies safe.
attributes.background: I work in retail and have seen people without babies buying baby milk and reselling to desperate mums at 2/3 times the price.This is leaving not only a shortage of stock on shelves but is unsafe for babies. The Government need to change the policy and ensure babies are getting the milk they need.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302823
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303070

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
